name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Aprendiz turbado
text:
No puedes tener a Darth Vader en tu equipo.
[special] - Descarta una carta de héroe de tu mano para entregar 2 escudos a un Personaje, o descarta una carta de villano de tu mano para infligir 2 puntos de daño a un Personaje.

name: Lobot
subtitle: Ayudante cíborg
text:
Mientras controles el campo de batalla, este Personaje posee la palabra clave Guardián.
[special] - Resuelve uno de tus dados, incrementando en 2 su valor de resultado.

flavor: "¿Amiga? Un término muy genereso teniendo en cuenta lo que pasó."
name: Ketsu Onyo
subtitle: Agente del Sol Negro
text: Antes de que uno de tus Personajes sea derrotado, puedes transferir un arma de ese Personaje a éste.

flavor: "No soporto a estos jawas. ¡Son criaturas desagradables!" <cite>C-3PO</cite>
name: Carroñero jawa
text: Después de que actives este Personaje, puedes descartar del juego de uno de tus Apoyos o Mejoras que tenga un coste igual o superior a 2 para recibir 1 recurso.

flavor: "To defeat your enemy, you must know your enemy." <cite>Maul</cite>
name: Hidden Motive
text: Choose a symbol. Then reroll an opponent's die. If that die just rolled the chosen symbol, remove it.

name: Crafted Lightsaber
text: Play only on an exhasted character.

name: Targeting Computer
text: Turn a support or upgrade die to any side.

flavor: Swift and highly maneuverable, this fighter was designed and flown by the Mandalorian Protectors.
name: Fang Fighter
text: Ambush.

name: Tinker
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a value of 1.

flavor: This projectile weapon uses magnetic field technology, making its operation nearly silent.
name: Verpine Sniper Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Emulate
text: Turn a character die to any side if there are 2 or more copies of that character in play.

name: Fight Back
text: Remove one of your dice to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

name: Ingenioso
text: Señala un Personaje de color Gris y retira uno de tus dados para recibir 1 recurso.

name: Surprise Attack
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1.

name: Supply Pack
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll any number of attached character's character or upgrade dice.

name: T-21 Repeating Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then you may reroll ths die instead of removing it from your pool.

flavor: While heavy and dcumbersome, some species could wield vibroswords one-handed.
name: Vibrosword
text: Redeploy.

flavor: The Bespin Wing Guard patrolled Cloud City to enforce order.
name: Bespin Wing Guard
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.

name: Dry Fields
subtitle: Atollon
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource if you have no resources.

name: Sith Temple
subtitle: Malachor
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
